response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special price of $11,500. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 11500}
